subject: Archive the plan
description:
Archive the fibonacci-replacement plan following the Archive Procedure:

1. Create destination folder: `mkdir -p ./plans/completed/fibonacci-replacement`
2. Move any plan artifacts to `./plans/completed/fibonacci-replacement/`
3. Parse session IDs from the Sessions table
4. Move task directories: `mv ~/.claude/tasks/<session-id> ./plans/completed/fibonacci-replacement/tasks/`
5. Update any in_progress tasks to completed
6. Final git operations:
   ```bash
   git add . && git commit -m "chore: archive fibonacci-replacement plan"
   GIT_SSH_COMMAND="ssh -o ServerAliveInterval=30 -o ServerAliveCountMax=5" git push
   gh pr ready
   gh pr merge --auto --merge
   ```

acceptance_criteria: PR marked ready and auto-merge enabled

verification.command: ls plans/completed/fibonacci-replacement/ && gh pr view --json state,mergeStateStatus
verification.expected: Plan directory exists, PR is ready for merge
